text: Yad Pita, bɨ Jisas Klays takaw nop dad ameb ak mɨdebin. Mɨñɨl yad mɨj anɨb ak ñu kɨl tɨkebin. Tɨkɨl, nɨbi binɨb God nɨbop aglak okok mɨdɨl, man ke okok ju am mɨdebɨm okok, nɨbop ñebin. Man ke okok ju am mɨdebɨm anɨb okok, Podus plopens ak, Galesiya plopens ak, Kapadosiya plopens ak, Esiya plopens ak, Bitiniya plopens ak mɨdebɨm.
